title: Bug 17825: ControlExampleText beeps when SWT.MULTI is chosen
description: In the SWT example ControlExample, under the Text tab, a beep sound is heard when changing the selection from SWT.SINGLE to SWT.MULTI. This behavior seems incorrect.
OB: When selecting SWT.MULTI in the Text tab of the ControlExample in SWT example, a beep sound is heard.
EB: There should be no beep sound when switching between SWT.SINGLE and SWT.MULTI in the Text tab of the ControlExample in SWT example.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Open the SWT example ControlExample.
2. Go to the Text tab.
3. Click on Styles SWT.SINGLE.
4. Click again on Styles SWT.MULTI.
Observe if a beep sound is heard during step 4.
